      • createBoundaryBox

        public static com.badlogic.gdx.physics.box2d.Body[] createBoundaryBox(com.badlogic.gdx.physics.box2d.World world,
                                                                      float boundaryWidth,
                                                                      float boundaryHeight,
                                                                      float friction)
        Creates a boundary box around using given dimensions. Body(ies) within the boundary will bounce off it.
        Parameters:
        world - the physics world
        boundaryWidth - the width of the boundary
        boundaryHeight - the height of the boundary
        friction - the friction of the bodies
        Returns:
        world boundaries (array of generated bodies)
